mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO COMPANION (COMP_GROUP,COMP_TITLE,COMP_COUNT, COMP_START_DATE, COMP_END_DATE, COMP_CONTENT,IMG_GRO_CODE)
VALUES (#{compGroup}, #{compTitle}, #{compCount},#{compStartDate},#{compEndDate}, #{compContent}, #{imgGroCode})
mapper.select: select * from companion c join member m on c.id= m.id
